query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Spanish | Lemma | English | Italian | Latin | Interlingua | French | Portuguese | Romanian | Esperanto | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | En | en | | | | | | | | | | la | el | | | | | | | | | | mitad | mitad | | | | | | | | | | del | de + el | | | | | | | | | | camino | camino | | | | | | | | | | de | de | | | | | | | | | | nuestra | nuestro | | | | | | | | | | vida | vida | | | | | | | | | | me | me | | | | | | | | | | encontré | encontrar | | | | | | | | | | por | por | | | | | | | | | | una | un | | | | | | | | | | selva | selva | | | | | | | | | | oscura | oscuro | | | | | | | | | | porque | porque | | | | | | | | | | la | el | | | | | | | | | | vía | vía | | | | | | | | | | recta | recto | | | | | | | | | | estaba | estar | | | | | | | | | | perdida | perder | | | | | | | | |
